name: schedule(after:interval:tolerance:options:_:)
desc: Performs the action at some time after the specified date, at the specified frequency, optionally taking into account tolerance if possible.
declaration: func schedule(after date: OperationQueue.SchedulerTimeType, interval: OperationQueue.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, tolerance: OperationQueue.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, options: OperationQueue.SchedulerOptions?, _ action: @escaping () -> Void) -> Cancellable
